Text: BidAsk Cc B NonPrivilegedpst Two items for immediate attention We need to do a complete document sweep for all relevant documents We will send you a list of document categories These categories will include Enron documents as well as documents in our possession that we received from third party vendors I would like to complete the first sweep by next FRI OCT We need to line up witnessjury consultants to work with us and our key witnesses before video depositions This is particularly important here since neither Jay nor Louise have ever had the pleasure of being deposed on video Far too many cases are lost in the initial video depositions because of substance or presentation or both We have worked with a number of really good consultants But is there a witnessjury consultant with whom you have worked on big cases that you would like for us to use or consider CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not the intended recipient or an authorized representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email and its attachments if any or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify the sender by return email and delete this email from your system Thank You

Settlement conference Cc B NonPrivilegedpst I spoke with BidAsks lead lawyer Sam Baxter earlier today about getting together in person to have an offtherecord settlement discussion where we would try to persuade him to drop his suit because we do not infringe He suggested Friday morning If you want me to attend we have to do it early so I can catch my SW flight to Houston for the Halliburton docket call Please let me know your availability on Friday and if not then when Also Dr Phil MCGraw Dr Phil on the Oprah show and his company Courtroom Sciences is on board for witness prep and jury consulting if we want to use them He has been told that ENRON may prefer someone it has worked with previously so let me know CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not the intended recipient or an authorized representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email and its attachments if any or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify the sender by return email and delete this email from your system Thank You

FW Eastern District of TexasB NonPrivilegedpst Here are the counties in the Eastern District Original Message From DeBose Annette Sent Monday October PM To Sims Bill Subject Eastern District of Texas maptopgif bytes maptopgif smmapgif bytes smmapgif vtibinshtmldlldistrictmaphtmmap dmapgif bytes This court is composed of seven divisions Division Number and Name Counties Beaumont Hardin Jasper Jefferson Liberty Newton and Orange Marshall Camp Cass Harrison Marion Morris and Upshur Paris Delta Fannin Hopkins Lamar and Red River Sherman Collin Cook Denton and Grayson Texarkana Bowie Franklin and Titus Tyler Anderson Cherokee Gregg Henderson Panola Rains Rusk Smith Van Zandt and Wood Lufkin Angelina Houston Nacogdoches Polk Sabine San Augustine Shelby Trinity and Tyler CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not the intended recipient or an authorized representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email and its attachments if any or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify the sender by return email and delete this email from your system Thank You

BidAsk Cc B NonPrivilegedpst I called Bids lawyer Sam Baxter about an extension to answer He was out so I left a detailed message with his secretary asking for an extension until NOV David Henry spoke with his friend who is Judge Wards permanent law clerk about the Courts procedure on extensions of time and scheduling orders The clerk said the judge routinely grants extensions to respond to Complaints and will send out a Scheduling Order and a Discovery Order shortly after we answer probably even if we file a motion with our answer In connection with our motion we need to verify that the correct sub has been sued ascertain ASAP whether our sub has any accounts with any companies in the Eastern District of Texas and get Enron Corp out of the case on a b motion Sharyn see me re this CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not the intended recipient or an authorized representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email and its attachments if any or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify the sender by return email and delete this email from your system Thank You
